L5Modular

Keep Your Laravel App Organized

Free Modules Get Started →

Organized Codebase

The main goal of L5Modular is to build better organized projects by separate the project into modules.

Reusable Modules

A nice side effect is the reusability of the modules. There are often enough projects where you don't have to reinvent the wheel. A platform to share and look for modules will be soon published.

Free & Open Source

L5Modular is a high quality MIT licensed open source project. It's fully tested and has a high ranked code quality.
